title: Owl

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Target a striked player, and roleblock them through immunity.
-Prepare a strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If one or more striked players are alive, all Thundercry members gain Roleblock Immunity.
-If two or more striked players are alive, gain Basic defense.
-If you prevent a target from negatively affecting a Thundercry member, gain a Strike.

desc:
Post 1720
*Did you know? According to a spanish legend, the owl would have witnessed Jesus' crucifixication. That is why it keeps repeating "cruz, cruz", spanish for cross.*
Roleblock Immunity
